descriptions.name: Overview of class
descriptions.value:
Introduction to probability theory and its applications. Random variables and distributions including binomial, Poisson, exponential, and normal. Monte Carlo simulation. Examples in reliability, inventory,
finance, and statistics. Homework, labs, and exams.

descriptions.name: Registration Requirements
descriptions.value:
Prerequisite: concurrent enrollment in MATH 234.
For instructions on being placed on the waitlist for this course, please see https://www.mccormick.northwestern.edu/industrial/undergraduate-program/current-students/waitlist-requests.html
